alert.note: Alert for Lee; Phillips; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 3:56AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lee, St. Francis, Phillips and northwestern Tunica Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 355 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hunter to near Garret Grove to 6 miles northwest of St. Charles. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Forrest City, Marianna, Hughes, Marvell, Madison, Palestine, Helena-West Helena, St Francis National Park, Caldwell, Wheatley, Lexa, Widener, Moro, Rondo, Aubrey, Haynes, Garret Grove, Brickeys, Watkins Corner and New Salem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and northwestern Mississippi.
